recommendation:
Full-Day Tour - History plus Affordable Street Food
Start: Union Square (Piata Unirii)
Walk through Baroque squares and visit both major cathedrals. Learn about the Habsburg influence and take your time exploring the architecture.
Next: Victory Square (Piata Victoriei)
Follow the steps of the 1989 Revolution, observe key landmarks, and feel the historical tension of the area.
Then: Bastion Theresia
Explore remaining sections of the old fortification walls.
Food Break
Grab budget friendly street food such as mici or langos near the central squares.
Beer Stop
End the day with an inexpensive local beer at a terrace near the old town.

Full-Day Tour - History with Premium Street Food
Start at Union Square for cathedral visits and museum entries.
Walk to Victory Square and observe the Revolution route.
Visit Bastion Theresia for fortification history.
Lunch includes gourmet street food stalls with higher quality regional products.
Finish with premium craft beer at an upscale pub.

Full-Day Tour - History plus Affordable Local Food
Explore Union Square and Victory Square.
Have a budget traditional lunch featuring dishes like sarmale or ciorba.
Walk the old fortress routes.
End with affordable beer at a local terrace.

Full-Day Tour - History plus Premium Local Cuisine
Visit all major squares, museums, and historic sites.
Have lunch at a high quality traditional restaurant.
Walk through heritage districts.
Finish with a craft beer tasting in a premium pub.
